text:
“Rodya, you’ve made me so happy by coming,” Pulcheria said. 

“Dounia missed you. Where has she been?” 

“I can wait for you. Just knowing you care is enough.” 

She wiped away tears. 

“Don’t mind my foolishness,” she said, jumping up. “I’ll get coffee!” 

“Mother, don’t trouble. I didn’t come for that.” 

He stepped closer. 

“Whatever happens, will you always love me?” 

“Rodya, what is the matter? Who would say anything bad about you?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Rodya seeks reassurance from his mother about her unconditional love for him despite any future troubles he may face.
